00071 
00072 int __osd_xattr_load(struct osd_device *osd, uint64_t dnode, nvlist_t **sa)
00073 {
00074         sa_handle_t *sa_hdl;
00075         char        *buf;
00076         int          rc, size;
00077 
00078         if (unlikely(dnode == ZFS_NO_OBJECT))
00079                 return -ENOENT;
00080 
00081         rc = -sa_handle_get(osd->od_os, dnode, NULL, SA_HDL_PRIVATE, &sa_hdl);
00082         if (rc)
00083                 return rc;
00084 
00085         rc = -sa_size(sa_hdl, SA_ZPL_DXATTR(osd), &size);
00086         if (rc) {
00087                 if (rc == -ENOENT)
00088                         rc = -nvlist_alloc(sa, NV_UNIQUE_NAME, KM_SLEEP);
00089                 goto out_sa;
00090         }
00091 
00092         buf = osd_zio_buf_alloc(size);
00093         if (buf == NULL) {
00094                 rc = -ENOMEM;
00095                 goto out_sa;
00096         }
00097         rc = -sa_lookup(sa_hdl, SA_ZPL_DXATTR(osd), buf, size);
00098         if (rc == 0)
00099                 rc = -nvlist_unpack(buf, size, sa, KM_SLEEP);
00100         osd_zio_buf_free(buf, size);
00101 out_sa:
00102         sa_handle_destroy(sa_hdl);
00103 
00104         return rc;
00105 }
00106 
00107 static inline int __osd_xattr_cache(const struct lu_env *env,
00108                                     struct osd_object *obj)
00109 {
00110         LASSERT(obj->oo_sa_xattr == NULL);
00111         LASSERT(obj->oo_db != NULL);
00112 
00113         return __osd_xattr_load(osd_obj2dev(obj), obj->oo_db->db_object,
00114                                 &obj->oo_sa_xattr);
00115 }
00116 
00117 static int
00118 __osd_sa_xattr_get(const struct lu_env *env, struct osd_object *obj,
00119                    const struct lu_buf *buf, const char *name, int *sizep)
00120 {
00121         uchar_t *nv_value;
00122         int      rc;
00123 
00124         LASSERT(obj->oo_sa_hdl);
00125 
00126         if (obj->oo_sa_xattr == NULL) {
00127                 rc = __osd_xattr_cache(env, obj);
00128                 if (rc)
00129                         return rc;
00130         }
00131 
00132         LASSERT(obj->oo_sa_xattr);
00133         rc = -nvlist_lookup_byte_array(obj->oo_sa_xattr, name, &nv_value,
00134                         sizep);
00135         if (rc)
00136                 return rc;
00137 
00138         if (buf == NULL || buf->lb_buf == NULL) {
00139                 /* return the required size by *sizep */
00140                 return 0;
00141         }
00142 
00143         if (*sizep > buf->lb_len)
00144                 return -ERANGE; /* match ldiskfs error */
00145 
00146         memcpy(buf->lb_buf, nv_value, *sizep);
00147         return 0;
00148 }
00149 
00150 int __osd_xattr_get_large(const struct lu_env *env, struct osd_device *osd,
00151                           uint64_t xattr, struct lu_buf *buf,
00152                           const char *name, int *sizep)
00153 {
00154         dmu_buf_t       *xa_data_db;
00155         sa_handle_t     *sa_hdl = NULL;
00156         uint64_t         xa_data_obj, size;
00157         int              rc;
00158 
00159         /* are there any extended attributes? */
00160         if (xattr == ZFS_NO_OBJECT)
00161                 return -ENOENT;
00162 
00163         /* Lookup the object number containing the xattr data */
00164         rc = -zap_lookup(osd->od_os, xattr, name, sizeof(uint64_t), 1,
00165                         &xa_data_obj);
00166         if (rc)
00167                 return rc;
00168 
00169         rc = __osd_obj2dbuf(env, osd->od_os, xa_data_obj, &xa_data_db);
00170         if (rc)
00171                 return rc;
00172 
00173         rc = -sa_handle_get(osd->od_os, xa_data_obj, NULL, SA_HDL_PRIVATE,
00174                         &sa_hdl);
00175         if (rc)
00176                 goto out_rele;
00177 
00178         /* Get the xattr value length / object size */
00179         rc = -sa_lookup(sa_hdl, SA_ZPL_SIZE(osd), &size, 8);
00180         if (rc)
00181                 goto out;
00182 
00183         if (size > INT_MAX) {
00184                 rc = -EOVERFLOW;
00185                 goto out;
00186         }
00187 
00188         *sizep = (int)size;
00189 
00190         if (buf == NULL || buf->lb_buf == NULL) {
00191                 /* We only need to return the required size */
00192                 goto out;
00193         }
00194         if (*sizep > buf->lb_len) {
00195                 rc = -ERANGE; /* match ldiskfs error */
00196                 goto out;
00197         }
00198 
00199         rc = -dmu_read(osd->od_os, xa_data_db->db_object, 0,
00200                         size, buf->lb_buf, DMU_READ_PREFETCH);
00201 
00202 out:
00203         sa_handle_destroy(sa_hdl);
00204 out_rele:
00205         dmu_buf_rele(xa_data_db, FTAG);
00206 
00207         return rc;
00208 }
00209 
00227 int __osd_xattr_get(const struct lu_env *env, struct osd_object *obj,
00228                     struct lu_buf *buf, const char *name, int *sizep)
00229 {
00230         int rc;
00231 
00232         if (unlikely(!dt_object_exists(&obj->oo_dt) || obj->oo_destroyed))
00233                 return -ENOENT;
00234 
00235         /* check SA_ZPL_DXATTR first then fallback to directory xattr */
00236         rc = __osd_sa_xattr_get(env, obj, buf, name, sizep);
00237         if (rc != -ENOENT)
00238                 return rc;
00239 
00240         return __osd_xattr_get_large(env, osd_obj2dev(obj), obj->oo_xattr,
00241                                      buf, name, sizep);
00242 }
00243 
00244 int osd_xattr_get(const struct lu_env *env, struct dt_object *dt,
00245                   struct lu_buf *buf, const char *name)
00246 {
00247         struct osd_object  *obj  = osd_dt_obj(dt);
00248         int                 rc, size = 0;
00249         ENTRY;
00250 
00251         LASSERT(obj->oo_db != NULL);
00252         LASSERT(osd_invariant(obj));
00253 
00254         if (!osd_obj2dev(obj)->od_posix_acl &&
00255             (strcmp(name, POSIX_ACL_XATTR_ACCESS) == 0 ||
00256              strcmp(name, POSIX_ACL_XATTR_DEFAULT) == 0))
00257                 RETURN(-EOPNOTSUPP);
00258 
00259         down_read(&obj->oo_guard);
00260         rc = __osd_xattr_get(env, obj, buf, name, &size);
00261         up_read(&obj->oo_guard);
00262 
00263         if (rc == -ENOENT)
00264                 rc = -ENODATA;
00265         else if (rc == 0)
00266                 rc = size;
00267         RETURN(rc);
00268 }
00269 
00270 void __osd_xattr_declare_set(const struct lu_env *env, struct osd_object *obj,
00271                              int vallen, const char *name,
00272                              struct osd_thandle *oh)
00273 {
00274         struct osd_device *osd = osd_obj2dev(obj);
00275         dmu_buf_t         *db = obj->oo_db;
00276         dmu_tx_t          *tx = oh->ot_tx;
00277         uint64_t           xa_data_obj;
00278         int                rc = 0;
00279         int                here;
00280 
00281         if (unlikely(obj->oo_destroyed))
00282                 return;
00283 
00284         here = dt_object_exists(&obj->oo_dt);
00285 
00286         /* object may be not yet created */
00287         if (here) {
00288                 LASSERT(db);
00289                 LASSERT(obj->oo_sa_hdl);
00290                 /* we might just update SA_ZPL_DXATTR */
00291                 dmu_tx_hold_sa(tx, obj->oo_sa_hdl, 1);
00292 
00293                 if (obj->oo_xattr == ZFS_NO_OBJECT)
00294                         rc = -ENOENT;
00295         }
00296 
00297         if (!here || rc == -ENOENT) {
00298                 /* we'll be updating SA_ZPL_XATTR */
00299                 if (here) {
00300                         LASSERT(obj->oo_sa_hdl);
00301                         dmu_tx_hold_sa(tx, obj->oo_sa_hdl, 1);
00302                 }
00303                 /* xattr zap + entry */
00304                 dmu_tx_hold_zap(tx, DMU_NEW_OBJECT, TRUE, (char *) name);
00305                 /* xattr value obj */
00306                 dmu_tx_hold_sa_create(tx, ZFS_SA_BASE_ATTR_SIZE);
00307                 dmu_tx_hold_write(tx, DMU_NEW_OBJECT, 0, vallen);
00308                 return;
00309         }
00310 
00311         rc = -zap_lookup(osd->od_os, obj->oo_xattr, name, sizeof(uint64_t), 1,
00312                         &xa_data_obj);
00313         if (rc == 0) {
00314                 /*
00315                  * Entry already exists.
00316                  * We'll truncate the existing object.
00317                  */
00318                 dmu_tx_hold_bonus(tx, xa_data_obj);
00319                 dmu_tx_hold_free(tx, xa_data_obj, vallen, DMU_OBJECT_END);
00320                 dmu_tx_hold_write(tx, xa_data_obj, 0, vallen);
00321                 return;
00322         } else if (rc == -ENOENT) {
00323                 /*
00324                  * Entry doesn't exist, we need to create a new one and a new
00325                  * object to store the value.
00326                  */
00327                 dmu_tx_hold_bonus(tx, obj->oo_xattr);
00328                 dmu_tx_hold_zap(tx, obj->oo_xattr, TRUE, (char *) name);
00329                 dmu_tx_hold_sa_create(tx, ZFS_SA_BASE_ATTR_SIZE);
00330                 dmu_tx_hold_write(tx, DMU_NEW_OBJECT, 0, vallen);
00331                 return;
00332         }
00333 
00334         /* An error happened */
00335         tx->tx_err = -rc;
00336 }
00337 
00338 int osd_declare_xattr_set(const struct lu_env *env, struct dt_object *dt,
00339                           const struct lu_buf *buf, const char *name,
00340                           int fl, struct thandle *handle)
00341 {
00342         struct osd_object  *obj = osd_dt_obj(dt);
00343         struct osd_thandle *oh;
00344         ENTRY;
00345 
00346         LASSERT(handle != NULL);
00347         oh = container_of0(handle, struct osd_thandle, ot_super);
00348 
00349         down_read(&obj->oo_guard);
00350         __osd_xattr_declare_set(env, obj, buf->lb_len, name, oh);
00351         up_read(&obj->oo_guard);
00352 
00353         RETURN(0);
00354 }
00355 
00356 /*
00357  * Set an extended attribute.
00358  * This transaction must have called udmu_xattr_declare_set() first.
00359  *
00360  * Returns 0 on success or a negative error number on failure.
00361  *
00362  * No locking is done here.
00363  */
00364 static int
00365 __osd_sa_xattr_update(const struct lu_env *env, struct osd_object *obj,
00366                       struct osd_thandle *oh)
00367 {
00368         struct osd_device *osd = osd_obj2dev(obj);
00369         char              *dxattr;
00370         size_t             sa_size;
00371         int                rc;
00372 
00373         ENTRY;
00374         LASSERT(obj->oo_sa_hdl);
00375         LASSERT(obj->oo_sa_xattr);
00376 
00377         /* Update the SA for additions, modifications, and removals. */
00378         rc = -nvlist_size(obj->oo_sa_xattr, &sa_size, NV_ENCODE_XDR);
00379         if (rc)
00380                 return rc;
00381 
00382         dxattr = osd_zio_buf_alloc(sa_size);
00383         if (dxattr == NULL)
00384                 RETURN(-ENOMEM);
00385 
00386         rc = -nvlist_pack(obj->oo_sa_xattr, &dxattr, &sa_size,
00387                                 NV_ENCODE_XDR, KM_SLEEP);
00388         if (rc)
00389                 GOTO(out_free, rc);
00390 
00391         rc = osd_object_sa_update(obj, SA_ZPL_DXATTR(osd), dxattr, sa_size, oh);
00392 out_free:
00393         osd_zio_buf_free(dxattr, sa_size);
00394         RETURN(rc);
00395 }
00396 
00397 int __osd_sa_xattr_set(const struct lu_env *env, struct osd_object *obj,
00398                        const struct lu_buf *buf, const char *name, int fl,
00399                        struct osd_thandle *oh)
00400 {
00401         uchar_t *nv_value;
00402         size_t  size;
00403         int     nv_size;
00404         int     rc;
00405         int     too_big = 0;
00406 
00407         LASSERT(obj->oo_sa_hdl);
00408         if (obj->oo_sa_xattr == NULL) {
00409                 rc = __osd_xattr_cache(env, obj);
00410                 if (rc)
00411                         return rc;
00412         }
00413 
00414         LASSERT(obj->oo_sa_xattr);
00415         /* Limited to 32k to keep nvpair memory allocations small */
00416         if (buf->lb_len > DXATTR_MAX_ENTRY_SIZE) {
00417                 too_big = 1;
00418         } else {
00419                 /* Prevent the DXATTR SA from consuming the entire SA
00420                  * region */
00421                 rc = -nvlist_size(obj->oo_sa_xattr, &size, NV_ENCODE_XDR);
00422                 if (rc)
00423                         return rc;
00424 
00425                 if (size + buf->lb_len > DXATTR_MAX_SA_SIZE)
00426                         too_big = 1;
00427         }
00428 
00429         /* even in case of -EFBIG we must lookup xattr and check can we
00430          * rewrite it then delete from SA */
00431         rc = -nvlist_lookup_byte_array(obj->oo_sa_xattr, name, &nv_value,
00432                                         &nv_size);
00433         if (rc == 0) {
00434                 if (fl & LU_XATTR_CREATE) {
00435                         return -EEXIST;
00436                 } else if (too_big) {
00437                         rc = -nvlist_remove(obj->oo_sa_xattr, name,
00438                                                 DATA_TYPE_BYTE_ARRAY);
00439                         if (rc < 0)
00440                                 return rc;
00441                         rc = __osd_sa_xattr_update(env, obj, oh);
00442                         return rc == 0 ? -EFBIG : rc;
00443                 }
00444         } else if (rc == -ENOENT) {
00445                 if (fl & LU_XATTR_REPLACE)
00446                         return -ENODATA;
00447                 else if (too_big)
00448                         return -EFBIG;
00449         } else {
00450                 return rc;
00451         }
00452 
00453         /* Ensure xattr doesn't exist in ZAP */
00454         if (obj->oo_xattr != ZFS_NO_OBJECT) {
00455                 struct osd_device *osd = osd_obj2dev(obj);
00456                 uint64_t           objid;
00457                 rc = -zap_lookup(osd->od_os, obj->oo_xattr,
00458                                  name, 8, 1, &objid);
00459                 if (rc == 0) {
00460                         rc = -dmu_object_free(osd->od_os, objid, oh->ot_tx);
00461                         if (rc == 0)
00462                                 zap_remove(osd->od_os, obj->oo_xattr,
00463                                            name, oh->ot_tx);
00464                 }
00465         }
00466 
00467         rc = -nvlist_add_byte_array(obj->oo_sa_xattr, name,
00468                                     (uchar_t *)buf->lb_buf, buf->lb_len);
00469         if (rc)
00470                 return rc;
00471 
00472         rc = __osd_sa_xattr_update(env, obj, oh);
00473         return rc;
00474 }
00475 
00476 int
00477 __osd_xattr_set(const struct lu_env *env, struct osd_object *obj,
00478                 const struct lu_buf *buf, const char *name, int fl,
00479                 struct osd_thandle *oh)
00480 {
00481         struct osd_device *osd = osd_obj2dev(obj);
00482         dmu_buf_t         *xa_zap_db = NULL;
00483         dmu_buf_t         *xa_data_db = NULL;
00484         uint64_t           xa_data_obj;
00485         sa_handle_t       *sa_hdl = NULL;
00486         dmu_tx_t          *tx = oh->ot_tx;
00487         uint64_t           size;
00488         int                rc;
00489 
00490         LASSERT(obj->oo_sa_hdl);
00491 
00492         if (obj->oo_xattr == ZFS_NO_OBJECT) {
00493                 struct lu_attr *la = &osd_oti_get(env)->oti_la;
00494 
00495                 la->la_valid = LA_MODE;
00496                 la->la_mode = S_IFDIR | S_IRUGO | S_IWUSR | S_IXUGO;
00497                 rc = __osd_zap_create(env, osd, &xa_zap_db, tx, la,
00498                                       obj->oo_db->db_object, 0);
00499                 if (rc)
00500                         return rc;
00501 
00502                 obj->oo_xattr = xa_zap_db->db_object;
00503                 rc = osd_object_sa_update(obj, SA_ZPL_XATTR(osd),
00504                                 &obj->oo_xattr, 8, oh);
00505                 if (rc)
00506                         goto out;
00507         }
00508 
00509         rc = -zap_lookup(osd->od_os, obj->oo_xattr, name, sizeof(uint64_t), 1,
00510                          &xa_data_obj);
00511         if (rc == 0) {
00512                 if (fl & LU_XATTR_CREATE) {
00513                         rc = -EEXIST;
00514                         goto out;
00515                 }
00516                 /*
00517                  * Entry already exists.
00518                  * We'll truncate the existing object.
00519                  */
00520                 rc = __osd_obj2dbuf(env, osd->od_os, xa_data_obj,
00521                                         &xa_data_db);
00522                 if (rc)
00523                         goto out;
00524 
00525                 rc = -sa_handle_get(osd->od_os, xa_data_obj, NULL,
00526                                         SA_HDL_PRIVATE, &sa_hdl);
00527                 if (rc)
00528                         goto out;
00529 
00530                 rc = -sa_lookup(sa_hdl, SA_ZPL_SIZE(osd), &size, 8);
00531                 if (rc)
00532                         goto out_sa;
00533 
00534                 rc = -dmu_free_range(osd->od_os, xa_data_db->db_object,
00535                                      0, DMU_OBJECT_END, tx);
00536                 if (rc)
00537                         goto out_sa;
00538         } else if (rc == -ENOENT) {
00539                 struct lu_attr *la = &osd_oti_get(env)->oti_la;
00540                 /*
00541                  * Entry doesn't exist, we need to create a new one and a new
00542                  * object to store the value.
00543                  */
00544                 if (fl & LU_XATTR_REPLACE) {
00545                         /* should be ENOATTR according to the
00546                          * man, but that is undefined here */
00547                         rc = -ENODATA;
00548                         goto out;
00549                 }
00550 
00551                 la->la_valid = LA_MODE;
00552                 la->la_mode = S_IFREG | S_IRUGO | S_IWUSR;
00553                 rc = __osd_object_create(env, obj, &xa_data_db, tx, la,
00554                                          obj->oo_xattr);
00555                 if (rc)
00556                         goto out;
00557                 xa_data_obj = xa_data_db->db_object;
00558 
00559                 rc = -sa_handle_get(osd->od_os, xa_data_obj, NULL,
00560                                         SA_HDL_PRIVATE, &sa_hdl);
00561                 if (rc)
00562                         goto out;
00563 
00564                 rc = -zap_add(osd->od_os, obj->oo_xattr, name, sizeof(uint64_t),
00565                                 1, &xa_data_obj, tx);
00566                 if (rc)
00567                         goto out_sa;
00568         } else {
00569                 /* There was an error looking up the xattr name */
00570                 goto out;
00571         }
00572 
00573         /* Finally write the xattr value */
00574         dmu_write(osd->od_os, xa_data_obj, 0, buf->lb_len, buf->lb_buf, tx);
00575 
00576         size = buf->lb_len;
00577         rc = -sa_update(sa_hdl, SA_ZPL_SIZE(osd), &size, 8, tx);
00578 
00579 out_sa:
00580         sa_handle_destroy(sa_hdl);
00581 out:
00582         if (xa_data_db != NULL)
00583                 dmu_buf_rele(xa_data_db, FTAG);
00584         if (xa_zap_db != NULL)
00585                 dmu_buf_rele(xa_zap_db, FTAG);
00586 
00587         return rc;
00588 }
00589 
00590 int osd_xattr_set(const struct lu_env *env, struct dt_object *dt,
00591                   const struct lu_buf *buf, const char *name, int fl,
00592                   struct thandle *handle)
00593 {
00594         struct osd_object  *obj = osd_dt_obj(dt);
00595         struct osd_thandle *oh;
00596         int rc = 0;
00597         ENTRY;
00598 
00599         LASSERT(handle != NULL);
00600         LASSERT(osd_invariant(obj));
00601 
00602         if (!osd_obj2dev(obj)->od_posix_acl &&
00603             (strcmp(name, POSIX_ACL_XATTR_ACCESS) == 0 ||
00604              strcmp(name, POSIX_ACL_XATTR_DEFAULT) == 0))
00605                 RETURN(-EOPNOTSUPP);
00606 
00607         if (OBD_FAIL_CHECK(OBD_FAIL_LFSCK_LINKEA_OVERFLOW) &&
00608             strcmp(name, XATTR_NAME_LINK) == 0)
00609                 RETURN(-ENOSPC);
00610 
00611         oh = container_of0(handle, struct osd_thandle, ot_super);
00612 
00613         down_write(&obj->oo_guard);
00614         CDEBUG(D_INODE, "Setting xattr %s with size %d\n",
00615                 name, (int)buf->lb_len);
00616         rc = osd_xattr_set_internal(env, obj, buf, name, fl, oh);
00617         up_write(&obj->oo_guard);
00618 
00619         RETURN(rc);
00620 }
00621 
00622 static void
00623 __osd_xattr_declare_del(const struct lu_env *env, struct osd_object *obj,
00624                         const char *name, struct osd_thandle *oh)
00625 {
00626         struct osd_device *osd = osd_obj2dev(obj);
00627         dmu_tx_t          *tx = oh->ot_tx;
00628         uint64_t           xa_data_obj;
00629         int                rc;
00630 
00631         /* update SA_ZPL_DXATTR if xattr was in SA */
00632         dmu_tx_hold_sa(tx, obj->oo_sa_hdl, 0);
00633 
00634         if (obj->oo_xattr == ZFS_NO_OBJECT)
00635                 return;
00636 
00637         rc = -zap_lookup(osd->od_os, obj->oo_xattr, name, 8, 1, &xa_data_obj);
00638         if (rc == 0) {
00639                 /*
00640                  * Entry exists.
00641                  * We'll delete the existing object and ZAP entry.
00642                  */
00643                 dmu_tx_hold_bonus(tx, xa_data_obj);
00644                 dmu_tx_hold_free(tx, xa_data_obj, 0, DMU_OBJECT_END);
00645                 dmu_tx_hold_zap(tx, obj->oo_xattr, FALSE, (char *) name);
00646                 return;
00647         } else if (rc == -ENOENT) {
00648                 /*
00649                  * Entry doesn't exist, nothing to be changed.
00650                  */
00651                 return;
00652         }
00653 
00654         /* An error happened */
00655         tx->tx_err = -rc;
00656 }
00657 
00658 int osd_declare_xattr_del(const struct lu_env *env, struct dt_object *dt,
00659                           const char *name, struct thandle *handle)
00660 {
00661         struct osd_object  *obj = osd_dt_obj(dt);
00662         struct osd_thandle *oh;
00663         ENTRY;
00664 
00665         LASSERT(handle != NULL);
00666         LASSERT(osd_invariant(obj));
00667 
00668         oh = container_of0(handle, struct osd_thandle, ot_super);
00669         LASSERT(oh->ot_tx != NULL);
00670         LASSERT(obj->oo_db != NULL);
00671 
00672         down_read(&obj->oo_guard);
00673         if (likely(dt_object_exists(&obj->oo_dt) && !obj->oo_destroyed))
00674                 __osd_xattr_declare_del(env, obj, name, oh);
00675         up_read(&obj->oo_guard);
00676 
00677         RETURN(0);
00678 }
00679 
00680 static int __osd_sa_xattr_del(const struct lu_env *env, struct osd_object *obj,
00681                               const char *name, struct osd_thandle *oh)
00682 {
00683         int rc;
00684 
00685         if (obj->oo_sa_xattr == NULL) {
00686                 rc = __osd_xattr_cache(env, obj);
00687                 if (rc)
00688                         return rc;
00689         }
00690 
00691         rc = -nvlist_remove(obj->oo_sa_xattr, name, DATA_TYPE_BYTE_ARRAY);
00692         if (rc == 0)
00693                 rc = __osd_sa_xattr_update(env, obj, oh);
00694         return rc;
00695 }
00696 
00697 static int __osd_xattr_del(const struct lu_env *env, struct osd_object *obj,
00698                            const char *name, struct osd_thandle *oh)
00699 {
00700         struct osd_device *osd = osd_obj2dev(obj);
00701         uint64_t           xa_data_obj;
00702         int                rc;
00703 
00704         if (unlikely(!dt_object_exists(&obj->oo_dt) || obj->oo_destroyed))
00705                 return -ENOENT;
00706 
00707         /* try remove xattr from SA at first */
00708         rc = __osd_sa_xattr_del(env, obj, name, oh);
00709         if (rc != -ENOENT)
00710                 return rc;
00711 
00712         if (obj->oo_xattr == ZFS_NO_OBJECT)
00713                 return 0;
00714 
00715         rc = -zap_lookup(osd->od_os, obj->oo_xattr, name, sizeof(uint64_t), 1,
00716                         &xa_data_obj);
00717         if (rc == -ENOENT) {
00718                 rc = 0;
00719         } else if (rc == 0) {
00720                 /*
00721                  * Entry exists.
00722                  * We'll delete the existing object and ZAP entry.
00723                  */
00724                 rc = -dmu_object_free(osd->od_os, xa_data_obj, oh->ot_tx);
00725                 if (rc)
00726                         return rc;
00727 
00728                 rc = -zap_remove(osd->od_os, obj->oo_xattr, name, oh->ot_tx);
00729         }
00730 
00731         return rc;
00732 }
00733 
00734 int osd_xattr_del(const struct lu_env *env, struct dt_object *dt,
00735                   const char *name, struct thandle *handle)
00736 {
00737         struct osd_object  *obj = osd_dt_obj(dt);
00738         struct osd_thandle *oh;
00739         int                 rc;
00740         ENTRY;
00741 
00742         LASSERT(handle != NULL);
00743         LASSERT(obj->oo_db != NULL);
00744         LASSERT(osd_invariant(obj));
00745         LASSERT(dt_object_exists(dt));
00746         oh = container_of0(handle, struct osd_thandle, ot_super);
00747         LASSERT(oh->ot_tx != NULL);
00748 
00749         if (!osd_obj2dev(obj)->od_posix_acl &&
00750             (strcmp(name, POSIX_ACL_XATTR_ACCESS) == 0 ||
00751              strcmp(name, POSIX_ACL_XATTR_DEFAULT) == 0))
00752                 RETURN(-EOPNOTSUPP);
00753 
00754         down_write(&obj->oo_guard);
00755         rc = __osd_xattr_del(env, obj, name, oh);
00756         up_write(&obj->oo_guard);
00757 
00758         RETURN(rc);
00759 }
00760 
00761 void osd_declare_xattrs_destroy(const struct lu_env *env,
00762                                 struct osd_object *obj, struct osd_thandle *oh)
00763 {
00764         struct osd_device *osd = osd_obj2dev(obj);
00765         zap_attribute_t   *za = &osd_oti_get(env)->oti_za;
00766         uint64_t           oid = obj->oo_xattr, xid;
00767         dmu_tx_t          *tx = oh->ot_tx;
00768         zap_cursor_t      *zc;
00769         int                rc;
00770 
00771         if (oid == ZFS_NO_OBJECT)
00772                 return; /* Nothing to do for SA xattrs */
00773 
00774         /* Declare to free the ZAP holding xattrs */
00775         dmu_tx_hold_free(tx, oid, 0, DMU_OBJECT_END);
00776 
00777         rc = osd_zap_cursor_init(&zc, osd->od_os, oid, 0);
00778         if (rc)
00779                 goto out;
00780 
00781         while (zap_cursor_retrieve(zc, za) == 0) {
00782                 LASSERT(za->za_num_integers == 1);
00783                 LASSERT(za->za_integer_length == sizeof(uint64_t));
00784 
00785                 rc = -zap_lookup(osd->od_os, oid, za->za_name,
00786                                  sizeof(uint64_t), 1, &xid);
00787                 if (rc) {
00788                         CERROR("%s: xattr %s lookup failed: rc = %d\n",
00789                                osd->od_svname, za->za_name, rc);
00790                         break;
00791                 }
00792                 dmu_tx_hold_free(tx, xid, 0, DMU_OBJECT_END);
00793 
00794                 zap_cursor_advance(zc);
00795         }
00796 
00797         osd_zap_cursor_fini(zc);
00798 out:
00799         if (rc && tx->tx_err == 0)
00800                 tx->tx_err = -rc;
00801 }
00802 
00803 int osd_xattrs_destroy(const struct lu_env *env,
00804                        struct osd_object *obj, struct osd_thandle *oh)
00805 {
00806         struct osd_device *osd = osd_obj2dev(obj);
00807         dmu_tx_t          *tx = oh->ot_tx;
00808         zap_attribute_t   *za = &osd_oti_get(env)->oti_za;
00809         zap_cursor_t      *zc;
00810         uint64_t           xid;
00811         int                rc;
00812 
00813         /* The transaction must have been assigned to a transaction group. */
00814         LASSERT(tx->tx_txg != 0);
00815 
00816         if (obj->oo_xattr == ZFS_NO_OBJECT)
00817                 return 0; /* Nothing to do for SA xattrs */
00818 
00819         /* Free the ZAP holding the xattrs */
00820         rc = osd_zap_cursor_init(&zc, osd->od_os, obj->oo_xattr, 0);
00821         if (rc)
00822                 return rc;
00823 
00824         while (zap_cursor_retrieve(zc, za) == 0) {
00825                 LASSERT(za->za_num_integers == 1);
00826                 LASSERT(za->za_integer_length == sizeof(uint64_t));
00827 
00828                 rc = -zap_lookup(osd->od_os, obj->oo_xattr, za->za_name,
00829                                  sizeof(uint64_t), 1, &xid);
00830                 if (rc) {
00831                         CERROR("%s: lookup xattr %s failed: rc = %d\n",
00832                                osd->od_svname, za->za_name, rc);
00833                 } else {
00834                         rc = -dmu_object_free(osd->od_os, xid, tx);
00835                         if (rc)
00836                                 CERROR("%s: free xattr %s failed: rc = %d\n",
00837                                        osd->od_svname, za->za_name, rc);
00838                 }
00839                 zap_cursor_advance(zc);
00840         }
00841         osd_zap_cursor_fini(zc);
00842 
00843         rc = -dmu_object_free(osd->od_os, obj->oo_xattr, tx);
00844         if (rc)
00845                 CERROR("%s: free xattr "LPU64" failed: rc = %d\n",
00846                        osd->od_svname, obj->oo_xattr, rc);
00847 
00848         return rc;
00849 }
00850 
00851 static int
00852 osd_sa_xattr_list(const struct lu_env *env, struct osd_object *obj,
00853                   const struct lu_buf *lb)
00854 {
00855         nvpair_t *nvp = NULL;
00856         int       len, counted = 0;
00857         int       rc = 0;
00858 
00859         if (obj->oo_sa_xattr == NULL) {
00860                 rc = __osd_xattr_cache(env, obj);
00861                 if (rc)
00862                         return rc;
00863         }
00864 
00865         LASSERT(obj->oo_sa_xattr);
00866 
00867         while ((nvp = nvlist_next_nvpair(obj->oo_sa_xattr, nvp)) != NULL) {
00868                 const char *name = nvpair_name(nvp);
00869 
00870                 if (!osd_obj2dev(obj)->od_posix_acl &&
00871                     (strcmp(name, POSIX_ACL_XATTR_ACCESS) == 0 ||
00872                      strcmp(name, POSIX_ACL_XATTR_DEFAULT) == 0))
00873                         continue;
00874 
00875                 len = strlen(name);
00876                 if (lb->lb_buf != NULL) {
00877                         if (counted + len + 1 > lb->lb_len)
00878                                 return -ERANGE;
00879 
00880                         memcpy(lb->lb_buf + counted, name, len + 1);
00881                 }
00882                 counted += len + 1;
00883         }
00884         return counted;
00885 }
00886 
00887 int osd_xattr_list(const struct lu_env *env, struct dt_object *dt,
00888                    const struct lu_buf *lb)
00889 {
00890         struct osd_object      *obj = osd_dt_obj(dt);
00891         struct osd_device      *osd = osd_obj2dev(obj);
00892         zap_attribute_t        *za = &osd_oti_get(env)->oti_za;
00893         zap_cursor_t           *zc;
00894         int                    rc, counted;
00895         ENTRY;
00896 
00897         LASSERT(obj->oo_db != NULL);
00898         LASSERT(osd_invariant(obj));
00899         LASSERT(dt_object_exists(dt));
00900 
00901         down_read(&obj->oo_guard);
00902 
00903         rc = osd_sa_xattr_list(env, obj, lb);
00904         if (rc < 0)
00905                 GOTO(out, rc);
00906 
00907         counted = rc;
00908 
00909         /* continue with dnode xattr if any */
00910         if (obj->oo_xattr == ZFS_NO_OBJECT)
00911                 GOTO(out, rc = counted);
00912 
00913         rc = osd_zap_cursor_init(&zc, osd->od_os, obj->oo_xattr, 0);
00914         if (rc)
00915                 GOTO(out, rc);
00916 
00917         while ((rc = -zap_cursor_retrieve(zc, za)) == 0) {
00918                 if (!osd_obj2dev(obj)->od_posix_acl &&
00919                     (strcmp(za->za_name, POSIX_ACL_XATTR_ACCESS) == 0 ||
00920                      strcmp(za->za_name, POSIX_ACL_XATTR_DEFAULT) == 0)) {
00921                         zap_cursor_advance(zc);
00922                         continue;
00923                 }
00924 
00925                 rc = strlen(za->za_name);
00926                 if (lb->lb_buf != NULL) {
00927                         if (counted + rc + 1 > lb->lb_len)
00928                                 GOTO(out_fini, rc = -ERANGE);
00929 
00930                         memcpy(lb->lb_buf + counted, za->za_name, rc + 1);
00931                 }
00932                 counted += rc + 1;
00933 
00934                 zap_cursor_advance(zc);
00935         }
00936         if (rc == -ENOENT) /* no more kes in the index */
00937                 rc = 0;
00938         else if (unlikely(rc < 0))
00939                 GOTO(out_fini, rc);
00940         rc = counted;
00941 
00942 out_fini:
00943         osd_zap_cursor_fini(zc);
00944 out:
00945         up_read(&obj->oo_guard);
00946         RETURN(rc);
00947 
00948 }
